questions.body: Would you be interested in attending a Climate Strike follow-up meeting on Wed, 9/25, at 8pm in the LC Center Room?

title: Lewisburg PA Climate Strike
end_message: Thanks so much! Here's a link to a petition to move Bucknell off of fossil fuels and toward clean, renewable energy. Take a look and add your name! https://forms.gle/yJaqdQPidgAjexGG9
